BahrLattice - Class in cellularAutomata.lattice
A two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a nearest-neighbor neighborhood that varies with time.
BahrLattice() - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.BahrLattice
Default constructor required of all Lattices (for reflection).
BahrLattice(String, Rule, int) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.BahrLattice
Create a two-dimensional cellular automaton with the same rule at all positions.

An exception for when a binary state is out of bounds (not 0 or 1).
BinaryStateOutOfBoundsException(String, int) - Constructor for exception cellularAutomata.error.exceptions.BinaryStateOutOfBoundsException
Creates an out of bounds exception that is triggered when a value is not a 0 or 1.
bindCtrlKey(JComponent) - Static method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.CAFrame
Binds the ctrl key to the component (so that a "right-click" can be used with macs by using a ctrl-click).
